Package org.jcp.jsr94.tck

Provides the classes for testing the compability of an implementation against the javax.rules package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AllTests Run all the test suites in the Test Compatability Kit.
ApiSignatureTest Signature test for the JSR 94.
ClassLoaderTest Tests the RuleServiceProviderManager and RuleServiceProvider classes.
ConfigurationExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.ConfigurationException class.
HandleTest Tests the compliance of Handle implementation classes.
InvalidHandleExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.InvalidHandleException class.
InvalidRuleSessionExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.InvalidRuleSessionException class.
ObjectFilterTest Test the javax.rules.ObjectFilter class.
RuleExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.RuleException class.
RuleExecutionExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.RuleExecutionException class.
RuleExecutionSetMetadataTest Test the javax.rules.RuleExecutionSetMetadata class.
RuleExecutionSetNotFoundExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.RuleExecutionSetNotFoundException class.
RuleRuntimeTest Test the javax.rules.RuleRuntime class.
RuleServiceProviderManagerTest Test the javax.rules.RuleServiceProviderManager class.
RuleServiceProviderTest Test the javax.rules.RuleServiceProvider class.
RuleSessionCreateExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.RuleSessionCreateException class.
RuleSessionTest Test the javax.rules.RuleSession class.
RuleSessionTypeUnsupportedExceptionTest Test the javax.rules.RuleSessionTypeUnsupportedException class.
StatefulRuleSessionTest Test the javax.rules.StatefulRuleSession class.
StatelessRuleSessionTest Test the javax.rules.StatelessRuleSession class.
 

Package org.jcp.jsr94.tck Description

Provides the classes for testing the compability of an implementation against the javax.rules package.
